ygData.subject: Re: New enchanter questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as red creatures go, it depends on how red it is. Creatures 1 level higher than you are yellow, no problem. Creatures 2 levels higher, you can hit
ygData.messageBody:
As far as red creatures go, it depends on how "red" it is.

Creatures 1 level higher than you are yellow, no problem.
Creatures 2 levels higher, you can hit them. Fairly well after Tashan.
Creatures 3 levels higher, failure EVERY time.

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Andersen [mailto:dea@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 11:55 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] New enchanter questions.


From: Daniel Andersen <dea@...>

Greetings,

I have just started a high elf enchanter on Tunare, having grown
tired of my monk, and I have heard many bad things about enchanters.
So,
I have a few questions...

1) Is there a list somewhere of spells that are unimplemented or
just plain worthless? I have heard rumors that the faction adjustment
spells such as Alliance do not actually do anything.

2) I have heard many problems with regards to tougher monsters
resisting spells. Is this only apparent at higher levels? I am
currently
5th level, and while my spells are resisted occasionally, I can still
affect
red creatures reasonably.

Thanks for your help, in advance. I'm trying to tell if I'm
going
to regret the time I spend advancing my character in the long run.

--Fayen, currently of Freeport.
